about-me-text: Fast and clean Angular-based web apps – focusing on UX and performance.

project-1.intro: A real-time chat application built with Angular and Firebase, featuring user authentication, private messaging.
project-1.li-1: Real-time messaging with Firebase Realtime Database
project-1.li-3: Responsive design for seamless experience across devices
project-1.li-4: Private messaging functionality, voice message included
project-1.li-5: Push notifications for new messages, ensuring users stay updated
project-1.li-6: Creating private and public posts with image upload feature
project-1.li-7: Sharing posts in other users profile and reacting to them
project-1.tech-stack: Tech Stack: Angular, Firebase, HTML5, SCSS, TypeScript
